text: :Acanthophora is also a synonym for Aralia. For the section of Solanum, see Solanum sect. Acanthophora. Acanthophora is a genus of marine red algae in the family Rhodomelaceae.There are 26 species (and infraspecific) names in the AlgaeBase database at present, of which 7 have been flagged as currently accepted taxonomically. == Species == Species in the genus Acanthophora include: * Acanthophora dendroides * Acanthophora spicifera * Acanthophora aokiihttp://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=372448 * Acanthophora muscoideshttp://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=146357 * Acanthophora nayadiformishttp://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=144783 * Acanthophora pacificahttp://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=372333 * Acanthophora ramulosahttp://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=375597 ==References== *World Register of Marine Species http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=143900 *AlgaeBasehttp://www.algaebase.org/search/genus/detail/?genus_id=33926 Category:Rhodomelaceae Category:Red algae genera
title: Acanthophora
